detail_desc: Wide jersey top in a cotton and modal blend with dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Soft, fine-knit jumper in a short, wide, slightly boxy style with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short shorts in stretch twill with a regular waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Top in soft jersey with short cap sleeves and a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved top in lace with a V-neck, seam with a lace band at the waist and a flared peplum. Lined.
Fully lined, patterned bikini. Top in a high cut at the front with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and an elasticated hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Tunic in a plumeti-weave modal blend with a round neckline with an opening and ties at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, narrow cuffs with a button, and seams in the lower section.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with a wide, elasticated waistband. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a racer back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit pima cotton with a raised spot pattern, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and buttoned cuffs. Short shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Jacket in cotton velvet with narrow notch lapels, buttons at the front, a chest pocket and fake welt front pockets with a flap. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Short, sleeveless dress in jersey with a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Relaxed-fit jumper in a soft knit with a stand-up collar, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Vest top in cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline, deep armholes with raw edges, and short slits in the sides.

Shirt in stretch Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and a yoke and darts at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Ankle-length trousers in a textured weave with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, a seam at the hem and a ribbed, rounded peplum.

Short, off-the-shoulder top in crinkled jersey with smocking at the top and hem, and long balloon sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.

Top and a pair of shorts in soft jersey. Sleeveless top with a glittery print motif and frills along the shoulders straps. Shorts with side pockets and an elasticated waist with a small frill trim and decorative bow.
Leotard in glossy jersey with decorative gathers at the top, a deep neckline at the back with double crossover straps and 3/4-length sleeves. Lined gusset.
Popover jacket in woven fabric with a drawstring hood and zip at the top. Large front pocket with a concealed zip, and elastication at the cuffs. Mesh lining.

Microfibre body with a gently sculpting effect on the waist, hips, back and seat. Non-wired, mesh-lined lace cups with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and glued hems for a smooth silhouette. Lined gusset with press-studs.

Knee-length shorts in washed cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and straight legs. Large coin pocket, diagonal side pockets and back pockets. Hammer loop at the back of one leg and a double pocket at the back of the other leg.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Elasticated scrunchies in woven fabric containing glittery threads.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend.

T-shirt in hard-washed slub cotton jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline and seam centre back. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Longer jacket in soft, washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. Detachable tie belt at the waist, buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem. Unlined.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Nylon jacket with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Oxford cotton cap with an embroidered fabric appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Unlined.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Leggings in soft cotton and viscose jersey with a wide, foldover panel at the waist for a more comfortable fit.
Thin tights with a spotted pattern and an elasticated waist.
Pyjamas in soft, cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Pyjamas in soft fleece. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and jersey ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and jersey ribbing at the hems.
Chinos in twill made from a cotton blend with a regular waist and zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to hem. Ribbed hems.

Short-sleeved shirt in an airy cotton weave with a tie or bow tie. Shirt with a collar, classic front, yoke with a pleat at the back and rounded hem. Pre-tied tie or bow tie with an elastic strap and adjustable plastic fastener.
Fitted body in jersey with glittery threads. Narrow cut at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Short dress in an airy weave with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck with narrow ties at the front, and a rounded hem.
High-waisted sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a sculpting effect on the tummy, hips and legs. Wide waist panel.
Top in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with an unlined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing at the waist. Concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband and mesh sections on the legs.
Short V-neck dress in a patterned weave with a wrapover front with ties at one side and concealed press-studs at the other. Unlined.

Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a unique nursing feature and a V-neck at the back with ties at the back of the neck. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Jumpers in an extra-soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a decorative bow at the top, buttons on one shoulder and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Tie in a spotted dobby weave. Width 7 cm.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Trousers in extra-stretchy cotton twill with a regular waist and zip fly with a button. Side pockets, welt back pockets, flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs, and skinny legs.
Cold-shoulder jumper in a soft rib knit with long sleeves.
Top in supersoft pile with a wrapover, jersey-lined drawstring hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, side pockets and a gently rounded hem.

Shirt in cotton denim with a cutaway collar, French front, open chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Jumper in soft, cable-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and a imitation leather appliqué at the hem.
Short, high-waisted shorts in woven fabric with pleats at the top and a tie belt. Zip fly, hook-and-eye fastener and side pockets.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes. Diameter from approx. 0.8 cm to 5 cm.
Trousers in a stretch, hole-patterned cotton weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, wide sides with flounces, and a high cut at the back.
Imitation leather handbag with decorative floral appliqués with studs, two handles and a zip at the top. Narrow, detachable shoulder strap and one inner compartment. Lined. Size 12x22x30 cm.
Pyjama shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly and side pockets.
Bikini briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset,wide sides and string back.
Block-coloured jumper in soft, rib-knit cotton with embroidered text on the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, shiny metal chain necklace. Adjustable length, 41-50 cm.
Fitted top in cotton jersey with a boat neck and 3/4-length sleeves.

Set with a short-sleeved shirt and pair of shorts in woven fabric. Shirt with a collar and buttons down the front. Shorts with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, fake pockets, and detachable, adjustable elastic braces with imitation leather details.
Short dress in an airy weave with long raglan sleeves and a decorative drawstring and opening at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and flounces at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a high waist, detachable belt with metal D-rings and a zip fly. Relaxed fit with side and back pockets, and tapered legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Short satin shorts with an elasticated waist, side pockets and slits in the sides.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and long sleeves.
Bag in soft suede with a flap, magnetic fastener and fixed shoulder strap. Unlined. Size 8.5x14x16.5 cm.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft satin. V-neck cami top with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with narrow elastication at the waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter of studs from 0.7 to approx. 2 cm. Length of earrings from 3.5 to approx. 6 cm.
Wrapover bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a text print, long sleeves and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Calf-length dress in patterned chiffon with short puff sleeves and an opening and covered button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.
Short-sleeved top in viscose jersey with a decorative metal chain around the neckline and sleeves.
Dungaree shorts in washed denim with adjustable straps with press-studs, a chest pocket and press-studs at the sides. Fake fly, fake front and back pockets, and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Gently fitted jacket in a textured weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front, welt front pockets and sleeves with gathered seams. Lined.
Earrings with plastic beads and tassels. Length 8.5 cm.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Wide-fitting blouse in an airy, zebra-striped crêpe weave. High collar with a drawstring at the top and bottom, a deep V-neck with narrow ties, and oversized, raglan balloon sleeves with a drawstring at the cuffs. Contrasting colour panels with decorative seams down the sleeves. Longer at the back.
